What is the purpose of the `getaddressesbyaccount` method in Verus?
The `getaddressesbyaccount` method returns a list of addresses associated with a given account.

getaddressesbyaccount "account" DEPRECATED. Returns the list of addresses for the given account. Arguments: 1. "account" (string, required) MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error. Result: [           (json array of string)  "VRSC_address" (string) a VRSC address associated with the given account  ,... ] Examples: > verus getaddressesbyaccount "tabby" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getaddressesbyaccount", "params": ["tabby"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
./raw_text_input_api_text/getaddressesbyaccount
What is the required format for the "account" argument when using the `getaddressesbyaccount` method?
The "account" argument must be set to an empty string (`""`) to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error.

getaddressesbyaccount "account" DEPRECATED. Returns the list of addresses for the given account. Arguments: 1. "account" (string, required) MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error. Result: [           (json array of string)  "VRSC_address" (string) a VRSC address associated with the given account  ,... ] Examples: > verus getaddressesbyaccount "tabby" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getaddressesbyaccount", "params": ["tabby"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/

What is the format of the result returned by the `getaddressesbyaccount` method?
The result is a JSON array of strings, where each string is a VRSC address associated with the given account.

getaddressesbyaccount "account" DEPRECATED. Returns the list of addresses for the given account. Arguments: 1. How can I use the `getaddressesbyaccount` method using the command line?
You can use the `getaddressesbyaccount` method using the command line by running the following command: `verus getaddressesbyaccount ""`
